Public Methods

Component getFigureEditorComponent (Diagram diagram, Figure figure, boolean isSelected)
Rectangle2D getDecoratedBounds (Diagram diagram, Figure figure, Rectangle2D rcBounds)

Detailed Description

Date:
08-20-2001
Author:
Eric Crahen
Version:
1.0

The FigureEditor controls the editing process as far as how the values being editing are interpreted and set, and what listeners need to be notified of those changes.

Member Function Documentation

Rectangle2D getDecoratedBounds ( Diagram diagram,
Figure figure,
Rectangle2D rcBounds )
 

Get the extended bounds for a Figure, these are bounds that a component should use to include a small area for decoration, such as different borders, or arrow heads that fall just outside the Figures normal bounds.

This allows editors to occupy a space different from the figure when neccessary.

Parameters:
Diagram  
Figure  
Rectangle2D   reuse a rectangle

Returns:
Rectangle2D
Parameters:
diagram  
figure  
rcBounds  

Reimplemented in DefaultFigureEditor, and DefaultLinkEditor.
